content: same chain-2 space chain 1 * 3-double_crochet cluster chain 1 in each space across in corner chain-2 space 3-double_crochet cluster chain 2 3-double_crochet cluster chain 1 * repeat from * to * around to last corner in last chain-2 space make one more 3-double_crochet cluster chain 2 and join with a slip_stitch to top of chain-3 fasten_off if desired a wider edging can be worked around just as if this were a traditional giant granny but turned at the end of each round like the initial granny square in this pattern turn your work over and rotate it 90 degrees then round 2 chain 3 turn 2-double_crochet cluster in same chain-2 space chain 2 3-double_crochet cluster in same chain-2 space chain 1 3-double_crochet cluster chain 1 in each chain-1 across *in corner chain-2 space 3-double_crochet cluster chain 2 3-double_crochet cluster chain 1 then 3-double_crochet cluster chain 1 in each chain-1 across * repeat from * to * around to starting corner join with a slip_stitch to top of beginning chain-3 round 3 chain 3 turn 2-double_crochet cluster in same chain-1 space chain 1 * 3-double_crochet cluster chain 1 in each chain-1 space across in corner chain-2 space 3-double_crochet cluster chain 2 3-double_crochet cluster chain 1 * repeat from * to * around join with a slip_stitch to top of starting chain-3 round 4 chain 3 turn 2-double_crochet cluster in same chain-1 space chain 1 *in corner chain-2 space 3-double_crochet cluster chain 2 3-double_crochet cluster chain 1 then 3-double_crochet cluster chain 1 in each chain-1 space across * repeat from * to * around to starting cluster and join with a slip_stitch to top of chain-3 fasten_off weave in your ends and you re done enjoy granny s baby log cabin blanket crochet pattern is copyright 2008 by
